name: CSS
description: The CSS interface holds useful CSS-related methods. No object with this interface are implemented: it contains only static methods and therefore is a utilitarian interface.

members.name: CSS.supports()
members.description: Returns a Boolean indicating if the pair property-value, or the condition, given in parameter is supported.

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the name of the CSS property to check.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the value of the CSS property to check.

parameters.name: supportCondition
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the condition to check.

members.name: CSS.escape()
members.description: Can be used to escape a string mostlyÂ for use as part of a CSS selector.
